mapper.sql: id, time, userId, userName, studentName, phoneNum, eMoney, eAge, eLevel, classId, className, schoolId, schoolName, isNew
mapper.update: UPDATE statistics.ms_billing_info AS sm LEFT JOIN microschool.wx_number_pool AS mw ON sm.phoneNum=mw.numberCode SET sm.userId=mw.bindAccountId WHERE mw.bindAccountId IS NOT NULL;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO statistics.ms_billing_info (time,userId,userName,studentName,phoneNum,eMoney,eAge,eLevel,classId,className,schoolId,schoolName,isNew,studentId, payNumber) SELECT NOW(),a.userId, info.userName, infoa.userName, phoneNum, eMoney, eAge, eLevel, c.class_id, c.className,c.school_id ,c.schoolName,2,c.student_id, c.stuPayNumber FROM (SELECT userId, phoneNum, eMoney, eAge, eLevel FROM statistics.ms_billing_info) a LEFT JOIN microschool.v_parent_student_class c ON a.userId = c.parent_account_id and a.phoneNum = c.stuPaynumber LEFT JOIN microschool.wx_user_info info ON a.userId = info.account_id LEFT JOIN microschool.wx_user_info infoa ON c.student_id = infoa.userId WHERE c.className IS NOT NULL AND infoa.userType = 3 AND info.userType = 2 AND c.student_class_sfjh=1;
mapper.delete: delete from ms_billing_info where phoneNum != payNumber
mapper.update: UPDATE ms_billing_info SET isNew=0 WHERE isNew=2;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO statistics.ms_billing_statistics(time,classId,className,schoolId,schoolName,areaId,areaName,num) select now(),classId,className, schoolId,schoolName,areaId, areaName,count(1) as num from (select a.userId, c.class_id as classId, c.className,c.school_id as schoolId ,c.schoolName,c.xzq_id as areaId,c.areaName from (SELECT userId, studentId FROM ms_billing_info ) a left join microschool.v_parent_student_class c on a.userId = c.parent_account_id and c.student_id = a.studentId where c.className is not null and c.student_class_sfjh=1) aa group by classId;
